message: I propose dividing the money 700000 for me and 300000 for you. This ensures we both get a fair share, considering the diminishing value of money with each round.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering the money will be worth less in the next round. This offer will be more beneficial for both of us in the long run.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 600000 for me and 400000 for you. This maintains a balance while accounting for the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
